title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム バトルオペレーション コード・フェアリー

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam: Battle Operation Code Fairy

description.en: The "Noisy Fairy Squadron, a secret unit under the direct control of Kycilia Zabi of the Principality of Zeon, is deployed somewhere in the North American continent. With only female members, they fight in the One Year War against the Earth Federation Forces. They are forced to face the unreasonableness of war and the bonds with their comrades...

altTitles.ja: 戦隊大失格

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

altTitles.vi: Tiến lên! Chiến đội thất sủng!

description.en: Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10,000 meters in the sky to invade Earth! The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety! The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest...?
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ja: 人類の守護者・竜神戦隊ドラゴンキーパーVS.世界征服を企む悪の軍団・怪人。彼らは互いの存亡を懸け、死闘を繰り広げ続けている！！……というのは、やらせの茶番劇。他の星から侵略してきた怪人達は、わずか１年で屈服。民衆の前で敗北を演じ続ける道化と化していた！悪者にすらなれず、隷従させられ続ける日々。そんな状況を覆すべく、一人の怪人が最強の大戦隊を相手に反旗を翻す！
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.vi: Bạn đã bao giờ tự hỏi, khi trở nên giàu có, thì bạn sẽ làm gì chưa? Bạn sẽ mua nhà lầu, mua xe hơi, mua chiếc quan tài tập thể trị giá 250k bi đen bên cạnh tàu Titanic kèm theo chiếc Logitech G F710, sản xuất từ những năm 2000 :3 Còn tôi, tôi sẽ tận hưởng cuộc sống này một cách trọn vẹn nhất mà không cần phải lo toan cho những khó khăn và bộn bề phía trước ( Và đi khắp nơi trên thế giới để Flex với diễn giả Trông Anh Ngược rằng có cả đống thứ trên Trái Đất này tốt hơn hàng của Ý ) . Nhưng than ôi, cuộc sống này đâu có đẹp như là giấc mơ làm chồng Onodera của đám qui bưu, lại càng không diệu kì như cách biến nàng tiên cá xinh đẹp trở thành một con cá trắm diễn xuất ngang như con cua cạp cạp của Đít sờ ni. Đánh đổi tuổi trẻ và nhiệt huyết để chạy deadline, kiếm từng đồng tiền đóng học đại học, ăn mì gói sống qua ngày, và những đêm không ngủ, ngồi buồn nghĩ về tương lai mai kia sẽ ra sao, rồi khóc và tự nhủ rằng mình khổ vãi cả lone. Nhưng khổ thế đ nào được bằng đám quái nhân bị bóc lột sức lao động như lũ nô lệ suốt 13 năm bởi cái đám mặc đồ bó sát trong bộ manga này được :3 Nhân vật chính của chúng ta vì không thể chịu đựng được nữa nên đã vùng lên để đấu tranh cho sứ mệnh của mình. Còn đạt được mục đích hay không, đọc đi rồi biết nhá các bro :3
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

altTitles.es-la: La Espada de la Inquisición Celestial

description.en:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～

altTitles.en: I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site"
The World's Strongest Witch has Begun: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can View the "Strategy Site"

altTitles.id: Aku Menjadi Penyihir Terkuat di Dunia: Aku Akan Hidup dengan Bebas di Dunia di Mana Hanya Aku yang Bisa Mengakses "Situs Panduan"

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

altTitles.ja: 鬼畜島

description.en: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.
description.ja: 無人島に上陸した、廃墟研究サークルの大学生たちを襲う白昼の恐怖!! 殺人鬼に拉致された仲間の救出に向かう一行を待ち受ける過酷な罠!! 地図から消された“禁断の島”に隠された闇が、若者たちの心を蝕んでいく…。

title.en: Manga de Tsudzuru Yuri na Hibi

altTitles.ja: まんがで綴る百合な日々
まんがで綴る百合な日々 女×女のバカップル同棲日記

altTitles.ja-ro: Manga de Tsudzuru Yuri na Hibi - Onna x Onna Bakappuru Dousei Nikki

description.en:
Negi is an illustrator, and Tanu is a career woman.

The two are a female couple. ♪

"I wonder what it means to love someone?"
"Am I weird or something?"

While Tanu was struggling with these worries, she met Negi through a hobby.
Meanwhile, Negi had been interested in Tanu ever since they first met.

After a long-distance relationship, they are now living together, and their dream is, of course, same-sex marriage!
Why not take a peek into the lives of these lovey-dovey girls
through this non-fiction four-panel comic?

altTitles.ja: 雨と君と

description.en: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
description.ja: 雨の降る日に、１人と１匹は出会いました。“あともうちょっと”がほっこり尊いと話題です。
description.ru: В один дождливый день она подобрала что-то похожее на собаку... Давайте же посмотрим, насколько хитрой может быть эта "собака"...
description.pt-br: Em uma noite chuvosa de verão, uma mulher e um "cachorro" se conheceram e a vida nunca mais foi a mesma desde então.

altTitles.ja: 後宮スキャンダル

description.en: Victimized by her little sister's trick, Hwa-yeong heads to the imperial palace to participate in the crown princess selection process. Now she'll have to put up with… six months of palace stay?! No way! As a last resort, Hwa-yeong tries to do everything wrong to get disqualified and sent home early but instead finds herself in the royals' favor. What's worse, coincidence keeps bringing Shin-yeong, the Crown Prince, in her way, and now things are becoming more intense and personal for both of them. "You wish to get kicked out now? I'll do everything in my power to see the opposite happen!" Will Hwa-yeong see her way through these obstacles and return home before six months?

title.en: Memoir of the God of War

altTitles.en: Memoir of the King of War

altTitles.ja: 戦王伝記

description.en:
Breathing does not guarantee everyone’s alive! Dan Sa Yu, a descendant of Goryeo, greatly reprimands the Central District for the sake of his friend whom he treasures the most. He reigns every battle! No one could stop him! Cheonpo Armed Forces. The greatest martial arts of Goryeo! The legend of Cheonpo Armed Forces lives on while the history of the King of War unfolds!

description.ja:
息をしているからといって、生きているわけではない！ 高麗の子孫である単砂流（たんさりゅう）、彼は大切な友人のために中原を駆け抜ける。 彼は戦の支配者！誰も彼を止めることはできない！ 天砲武将類（てんほうぶしょうるい）、それは高麗の偉大なる武功！ 天砲武将類の伝説は永久で、戦王の壮大な歴史が幕を開く！

description.ko:
숨을 쉰다고 해서 모두가 살아있는 것은 아니다!

고려의 후예 단사유, 가장 소중한 친구를 위해 중원을 질타하다.
그는 전투에서 군림하는 자! 누구도 그를 막을 수 없다!

천포무장류. 위대한 고려의 절대 무공!
천포무장류의 전설은 영원하고, 전왕(戰王)의 위대한 역사가 펼쳐진다!

description.ru:
То, что ты жив, покажет не стук твоего сердца! Дан Саю, потомок Горё, которому нет равных в бою, решил отплатить сполна Чон Вону за своего дорогого друга. Никто его не остановит! Чхонпо наращивает боевую мощь. Полная безнаказанность, которую нельзя оставить без внимания! Легенды о боевых искусствах Чхонпо будут жить вечно, а великому сказанию о бывшем короле лишь предстоит начаться!

altTitles.ja: ナインピークス NINE PEAKS

description.en:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ja: 真汐樂(ましおがく)は父と2人暮らしの高校1年生。入学早々上級生と乱闘騒ぎを起こし停学処分となった矢先、突然の事故で父を亡くす。父の通夜の晩に、父との思い出である堤防釣りに出かけた樂は、海に落ち22年前にタイムリープしてしまう。そして樂を海から助けたのは、他ならぬ自分と同い年の父・春実だった。春実の両親(樂の祖父母)に気に入られた樂は、宮城樂として真汐家に居候することに。そして、祖父のはからいで父と同じ青波高校に通うことになる。22年前の玖嶺の街は不良だらけ。樂は父と2人でこの街の頂点を目指す!!
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

altTitles.ja: パラサイト・イヴ

description.en:
Kiyomi, who was subject to strange recurring dreams, dies in an car accident.
Her husband, the famous biologist Nagashima, is driven mad over her death.
He obtains her liver from the coroner, claiming he wants to use it for research.
But this is just a cover up for his actual intention: bringing Kiyomi back to life.

(Source: MyAnimeList)

title.en: A Red Laurel To My Emperor

altTitles.zh-hk: 為我的皇帝獻上紅月桂花

altTitles.en: Red Laurel Flowers to My Emperor

description.en: Laurel Neales, the first princess of Tortia, has been married off to the emperor of Kairos following a political feud that ended with the assassination of her parents. Undiscouraged by the circumstances, Laurel refuses to give in to becoming yet another of the emperor's concubines. Instead, she plays along with his romantic whims and gains her own form of power in this new life by proposing an offer he cannot refuse: to facilitate his conquest of the land that betrayed her.

title.en: Duke Pendragon: Master of the White Dragon

altTitles.ja: 白龍公爵ペンドラゴン

altTitles.es-la: El Duque del dragón blanco: Pendragon

description.en:
Born as the successor of a low-ranking noble household, Raven Varte wears the sin of plotting a rebellion against the empire. To be granted amnesty, he was sent to fight demons alongside the worst corp of the empire, the ”Demon” corp. Most say that it is a place where most won’t survive for even a year, but Raven somehow managed to survive for ten. When his amnesty was in front of his eyes, on his last battlefield, he met the ‘Successor of the Pendragon Duke Household, Eren Pendragon.

---

description.ja:
下級貴族の次男として生まれたレイヴン・ヴァルトは反逆の汚名を着せられ、 赦免を見返りに最悪の部隊である"羅刹隊”で魔物と戦うことに。 大半は1年も生きることができないと言われる場所で、レイヴンは10年の歳月を生き延びた。 赦免を目前に控えたある日、最後の戦場でペンドラゴン公爵家の後継者であるエレン・ペンドラゴンと共に任務にあたるが…

---

description.ko:
하급 귀족 가문의 차남으로 태어난 레이븐 발트.
반역에 연루되어 홀로 살아남은 그는
사면을 대가로 ‘악귀 부대’에서 싸우게 된다.

대부분이 1년을 버티지 못하는 곳에서
10년의 사면기간을 채울 때까지 살아남은 레이븐 발트.

사면을 목전에 둔 어느 날,
어려운 임무를 받고 팬드래건 공작가문의 후계자인
엘렌 팬드래건과 함께 임무에 투입되는데….

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iRX266roHHM)

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58558135)
description.ru:
Рэйвен Вальте, наследник малоизвестной аристократической семьи, обвиняется в бунтовщичестве против империи. У него есть выбор - ссылка, или смерть, и он выбирает ссылку. Его наказание - служба в войсках истребителей демонов, худшем военном подразделении в империи. Никто не верит, что Рейвен способен выжить там хотя бы год, но он приспосабливается и выживает до конца срока в десять лет. За несколько дней до амнистии он встречает на поле боя герцога Пендрагона, и происходит невероятное. 

---

altTitles.ja: タダでは抱かれません

altTitles.en: I Won't Sleep with You for Free

altTitles.id: Aku Gak Nidurin Kamu Secara Cuma-cuma

altTitles.th: ชีวิตพลิกผัน ฉันขายตัวให้เพื่อน

description.en: Miyako Kirishima, a university student and aspiring teacher, is a poor girl who enjoys being frugal. One day, she has a meal with Yui Nakano, her friend whom she occasionally tutors. On the way home, Yui invites her to a love hotel. Miyako is reluctant, unwilling to have sex with a friend. However, Yui cuts her off, offering her 30000 yen for sex! Subsequently, Miyako ends up in more "transactions" with her other friends at her women's university!? The curtain rises on a tale of yuri, friendship, money, and sex♡.
description.id: Kirishima Miyako, mahasiswa di sebuah universitas khusus wanita dan calon guru, adalah seorang gadis miskin yang menjalani hidup serba hemat. Suatu hari, setelah ditraktir oleh teman gadisnya Nakano Yui, dia diajak untuk mengunjungi ke love hotel. Namun, dia menolaknya karena enggan untuk berhubungan seks dengan temannya. Sampai kemudian, Yui menawarkannya 30.000 yen jika Miyako menerima ajakannya. Sejak saat itu, Miyako melakukan lebih banyak "transaksi" dengan teman-temannya yang lain dari universitasnya!? Kisahpun Yuri tentang persahabatan, uang dan seks pun dimulai.
description.th: คิริชิมะ มิยาโกะ สาวมหาลัยยาจกที่ใฝ่ฝันอยากเป็นครู ได้จับพลัดจับผลูไปเข้าโรงแรมม่านรูดกับเพื่อนซี้นามว่า นากาโนะ ยุย โดยเธอขอมีเซ็กส์ด้วยโดยแลกกับเงิน 30000 เยน! แบบนี้มีหรือมิยาโกะจะไม่เอา!

altTitles.ja: 7人の眠り姫

description.en: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?
description.ru:
Герой пришел спасти спящую принцессу от проклятья злой ведьмы, но когда он добрался до места... Там оказалось 7 девушек!
Принц Рудбекии - Алек и семь принцесс, в стране, где они единственные бодрствующие, начинают свою совместную жизнь, чтобы освободить всех ото сна!
description.pt-br: Um príncipe errante partiu para quebrar uma antiga maldição que enfeitiça o Reino de Amaryllis, tentando despertar sua princesa com um beijo de amor verdadeiro. No entanto, ninguém lhe disse que havia sete princesas para beijar! Agora ele precisa assumir a responsabilidade, vivendo com elas enquanto descobrem por que o povo de Amaryllis está incapaz de despertar. Será que eles conseguirão um final feliz?

description.ja: 忍びの里から抜け出した世間知らずのくノ一が出会ったのは、女子高生の殺し屋!? ひょんなことから始まった共同生活は危険（ドキドキ）がいっぱい…！

Начинается непредсказуемая совместная жизнь ниндзя и убийцы★.

description.en:
In his pocket is a black iron pistol. In his heart a jet black soul.

The story takes place in Edo in 1853. Nicknamed Zangetsu, Rouji is a young chief in charge of the Mitakaya wholesale shipping agency. He has a bright future ahead of him, but behind his affable mask hides an important member of the Yoshihira faction, rice brokers who control the Edo underworld. He plans to rise through the ranks of the organization, and his weapon of choice is the Colt M1851 Navy, the most advanced revolver of the time! With his skill in handling weapons and his composure, Rouji tries to make his way in the Edo underworld.
description.ja:
懐に隠すは黒鉄の銃。 心に宿すは漆黒の魂。

舞台は1853年の江戸。「残月」の通り名を持つ男・郎次は廻船問屋『三多加屋』を仕切る若き番頭。将来を嘱望される郎次の裏の顔は、江戸の暗黒街を支配する札差・儀平一派の大幹部だった。組織の中で成り上がりを目論む郎次の武器は、当時最新鋭の回転式拳銃・コルトM1851ネイビー！鍛え抜かれた銃捌きと持ち前の度胸で、郎次は江戸の暗黒街でのし上がろうとする。

description.en: It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended! One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality!
description.ja: 新学期。2年生に進級した男子高校生・阿比倉くん達のクラス担任になったのは、機嫌を損ねれば呪われると噂の通称『こわこわ先生』こと、鶸村ひより先生だった！ そんな、『こわこわ先生』の裏の一面を、ある日の放課後、目撃してしまった阿比倉くんは……。まさかのギャップに悶絶必至！

Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother... or rather, pet?

**Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Serialization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**
description.es: En la casa donde vive con su hermana, Hi-chan, la amiga de su hermana, se queda frecuentemente. Ella tiene una cara perfectamente linda, y además de eso, no tiene sentido del espacio personal. Asahi, un estudiante de preparatoria otaku, ¿quedará a su merced...? ¡El popular one-shop “The Cutest Girl Closest to Me” ha sido retitulado y serializado!
description.ja: 姉とふたり暮らしの家にいりびたる、姉の友人・ひーちゃん。完璧に顔がよくてかわいい彼女に、オタク男子高校生・旭は翻弄されっぱなし…?
description.pt-br: Hinako, amiga da irmã mais velha de Asahi, é uma visitante frequente na casa do garoto do ensino médio. Ela está sempre confundindo a mente dele com sua atitude sugestiva, enquanto o trata como um irmãozinho... ou melhor, como um bichinho de estimação? Uma história de amor entre uma gyaru com um senso deturpado de proximidade e um otaku que age como se fosse o pai dela!

Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.

title.en: Why Are You Obsessed With Your Fake Wife?

altTitles.pl: Dlaczego Masz Obsesję na Punkcie Swojej Fałszywej Żony?

description.en:
"You'd better not even dream of being recognized as my wife. There will never be an heir from a daughter of Balajit.”

Nadia couldn't agree more with his opinion.
Thank you, Marquis, be sure to keep your word.

“The Marquis said you had no intention of sleeping with me.”
“… … .”
“So, to ensure an heir, there's no other choice but to take a concubine... … .”

Nadia's head jerked at the sound of something crushing on her.
Then, out of the corner of her eyes, she saw that the table her husband was working on had cracked.

No, why did it suddenly break?
description.ko:
“내 아내로 인정받을 망상 따위 꿈에도 하지 않는 게 좋을 거다. 내가 발라지트의 딸에게서 후사를 볼 일은 영영 없을 테니.”

나디아는 하마터면 나도 같은 생각이라고 맞장구칠 뻔했다.

감사합니다, 후작놈아.
자기 입으로 한 말은 꼭 지키세요.

***

“후작님께서 저와 합방을 할 의사가 없다고 하셨거든요.”
“…….”
“그러니 후계를 위해선 어쩔 수 없이 첩을 들이는 수밖에…….”

콰직.
무언가 으스러지는 소리에 나디아의 고개가 홱 돌아갔다.
그러자 남편이 짚은 테이블의 한 구석에 금이 간 모습이 보인다.

아니, 저게 갑자기 왜 부서져?
description.pl:
"Lepiej, żebyś nie marzyła o uznaniu cię za moją żonę. Nigdy nie miałbym następcy z córką Balazita".
Słysząc to, Nadia prawie powiedziała: "Czuję to samo".
Dziękuję ci, markizie. Mam nadzieję, że dotrzymasz swoich słów.
***
"Powiedziałeś, że nie masz zamiaru dzielić ze mną łoża".
"..."
"Więc dla dobra następcy wiem, że nie masz innego wyboru, jak sprowadzić konkubinę..."
pęknięcie
Głowa Nadii odwróciła się na ten dźwięk.
W następnej chwili widzi, pęknięcie w rogu stołu, przy którym był jej mąż.
To znaczy, dlaczego ten stół nagle się złamał?

description.en:
**"You don't need math for murder" - Miharu S.**    

Raizou Hiraga is a retired officer from the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. 
After learning that his grandson is stricken with a deadly illness requiring expensive treatment,
Raizou comes across a vacancy flier for the mysterious SS Agency and applies for the job. 
However, after taking his first job with 11-year-old Miharu Suzukaze as partner, he discovers 
that his new occupation is more than meets the eye…

Устраиваясь на работу, он знакомится с 11-летней Михару и оказывается втянут в цепь загадочных событий… Но к чему это приведет? A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! However, that special ability is not used to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all one's might! A unique story of conquering another world begins here!

The protagonist, “Sao” has been reborn with his memories from his past life. He’s born as a son of a rural villager, but his true identity is a reincarnated person with cheat abilities and the knowledge of the modern world. With the class “Rod Master,” he received as he grows up, and the many skills that came up with it, he can defeat enemies, help people, and even for sex.

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau, Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évoluer ? Arriveront-elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.

description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.es-la: Aya, una estudiante de secundaria alegre y de moda, se enamora perdidamente de un empleado de una tienda de CD local. Tiene un aire de misterio, un gran estilo y un gusto musical impecable. Lo que ella no sabe es que...
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

title.en: Netorare Manga no Kuzu Otoko ni Tensei Shita Hazu ga Heroine ga Yottekuru Ken

altTitles.ja: 寝取られ漫画のクズ男に転生したはずがヒロインが寄ってくる件

altTitles.en: I was Reincarnated as the Scumbag from a Netorare Manga, But the Heroine is Coming on to Me
The Story of a Man Who is Reincarnated as the Shittiest Guy in a Doujin, but the Heroine Keeps on Coming Close to Him

altTitles.zh: 我转生成了NTR漫画里的黄毛，但是女主却倾心于我

altTitles.ru: Я перевоплотился в подонка из netorare манги, но героиня предпочла меня главному герою

altTitles.es-la: Reencarné como el Netoreador de una Historia NTR, pero definitivamente no seré uno

description.en: I suddenly remembered. This world is the world of an erotic manga, and that I was reincarnated as the scumbag who is supposed to steal the heroine in this world. Well, I don't have such a hobby, so I thought the heroine should get along with the protagonist. But why are you paying attention to me, heroine?
description.ja:
ふと俺は思い出した。この世界がエロ漫画の世界であり、ヒロインを寝取る役目のクズ男に自分が転生したことを。まあ俺にその趣味はないので、ヒロインは主人公と仲良くやってくれ。と思ったのに…ヒロイン、なんでお前は俺に構うんだよ!
小説投稿サイト掲載の人気作『漫画に登場する最悪の男に生まれ変わったはずがヒロインが寄ってくる件』をついにコミカライズ!
description.pt-br: De repente, eu me lembrei. Este mundo é o mundo de um mangá erótico, e eu reencarnei como o canalha que supostamente vai roubar a heroína neste mundo. Bem, eu não tenho esse tipo de hobby, então eu achei que a heroína deveria se dar bem com o protagonista. Mas por que você está prestando atenção em mim, heroína?

description.en:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?originalProductId=522173)
description.ko:
같은 반 여자애에게 약점을 잡혀 괴롭힘 당하는 고등학생 '허정우'. 피폐한 나날을 보내던 정우의 반에 전학생 '한보라'가 온다. 까만 생머리와 다리에 얼룩을 가진 그 아이를 보고 정우는 강한 기시감을 느낀다. 아니나다를까, 시비 거는 반 아이들을
제압한 한보라는 그들에게 묻는다. '나랑 비슷한 애 본 적 있어?' 어쩌면 꼬인 것을 바로잡아줄 보라에게 정우는 접근하기로 하는데...

altTitles.ja: 乙女戦争 ディーヴチー・ヴァールカ

altTitles.fr: Divci Valka, La guerre des pucelles

description.en:
The year is 1420. A small village in the Kingdom of Bohemia is wiped out by marauding Crusader knights. A young peasant girl named Šárka is the sole survivor of the massacre. She meets up with Jan Žižka, leader of the Hussite army, and chooses to take up arms…
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/divci-valka-maidens-war)
description.pt-br: O ano é 1420. Uma pequena vila no Reino da Boêmia é destruída por cavaleiros da cruzada. Uma jovem camponesa chamada Sarka é a única sobrevivente do massacre. Ela se encontra com Jan Zizka, líder do exército hussita, e decide pegar em armas…

altTitles.ja: 水姫先輩の恋占い

description.en:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

title.en: Imaizumi Brings All the Gals to His House

altTitles.ja: 今泉ん家はどうやらギャルの溜まり場になってるらしい～DEEP～

altTitles.ja-ro: Imaizuminchi wa Douyara Gal no Tamariba ni Natteru Rashii ~DEEP~
Imaizumin-chi wa Douyara Gyaru no Tamariba ni Natteru Rashii ~DEEP~

altTitles.en: Imaizumi's Home Has Apparently Become A Gal Hangout Spot ~Deep~
Imaizumin's House Is a Place for Gals to Gather
Imaizumin's House Is a Hangout Place for Gals ~Deep~

altTitles.id: Rumah Imaizumi adalah Tempat Nongkrong Para Cewek
Rumah Imaizumi adalah Tempat Nongkrong Cabe-cabean
Rumah Imaizumi adalah Tempat Nongkrong Gal

altTitles.zh: 今泉家似乎成了辣妹的聚集地~deep~

description.en: Imaizumi is a high school boy who lives alone in his apartment for a reason. He has a secret that he can't tell to anyone. And the secret is that he lives with the top three Gyarus (gals) of his school, Hamasaki, Kurumizaka, and Sasaki. He spends his day playing, talking and getting physical with these Gyarus, all of whom have a quirk or two. Imaizumi-kun is getting more and more addicted to his lazy, naughty and free "youth"...?
description.id: Imaizumi-kun, seorang siswa SMA yang hidup sendiri karena suatu alasan. Dia memiliki rahasia yang tidak bisa diketahui oleh siapa pun. Yaitu tinggal bersama tiga gadis "Hamasaki", "Kurumizaka" dan "Sasaki" yang berada di kasta atas di sekolah.

title.en: Sono Akuyaku Kizoku, Mama Heroine ga Suki Sugiru ~Shinshi na Doryoku de Saikyou to Nari Fuguu na Oshi Chara Tasukemakuru~

altTitles.ja: その悪役貴族、ママヒロインが好きすぎる ～真摯な努力で最強となり不遇な推しキャラ助けまくる～

altTitles.en: The Villainous Noble Loves Mom Heroines Too Much ~Becoming The Strongest With Sincere Effort To Save Misfortunate Fave Chars~
That Villainous Aristocrat Is Actually Crazy About Mom Heroines ~With His Earnest Hard Work, He Becomes the Strongest and Saves All of His Favorite Characters~
The Villainous Aristocrat Loves His Mother Heroine Too Much: Becoming the Strongest Through Sincere Efforts and Saving His Favorite Character

description.en:
The mom characters who appear in the game *MamaFan* are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. “Why... Why do such cute moms have to die?!”. Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then on a certain day, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of *MamaFan*... However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who's got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, who's crazy about mom characters — his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin!
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71300)
description.ja:
ゲームに登場するママキャラたちは、全員がバッドエンドルートしかない、あまりにも不遇すぎるサブヒロインでした――。

「なんで……なんでこんなかわいいママが死ななきゃならないんだよぉおお！」

彼女たちの救済ルートを求めるも、叶わず落胆の日々を送っていた主人公。だが、ある日突然このゲーム世界に転生することに。

・・・ただし、闇落ちルートしかない悪役貴族として。

title.en: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR　Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.

altTitles.ja: 高度に発達した医学は魔法と区別がつかない

altTitles.ja-ro: Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku wa Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai
Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku ha Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai

altTitles.en: Any Sufficiently Advanced Medical Science Is Indistinguishable From Magic
Highly Advanced Medicine Is Indistinguishable From Magic
I Used High-Level Medicine to Counter Magic

altTitles.ne: उच्च विकसित औषधी जादू भन्दा कम छैन

altTitles.es-la: La medicina altamente desarrollada no se puede diferenciar de la magia

description.en:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore/Japan only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)
description.ja: 医療魔法が独占された異世界に転移した現役医師・天海唯人。スライム、キマイラ、獣人…はじめて出会う住人たちに驚きながらも、わずかな医療器具と自身の知識で、病魔や怪我に立ち向かう。果たして彼は異世界の住人たちを治療し、苦しむ人々を救うことができるのか。
description.es-la:
¿Funciona la medicina moderna en otro mundo? Sin trampas ni equipos modernos. Un médico se enfrenta a un mundo dominado por la magia. El doctor Amami Yuito es transferido a un mundo diferente donde la magia médica está monopolizada. Slimes, quimeras, hombres bestia... Le sorprenden los habitantes con los que se encuentra por primera vez, pero con el poco equipo médico que tiene y sus propios conocimientos, es capaz de combatir enfermedades y heridas.
¿Podrá curar a los habitantes del otro mundo y salvar a los que sufren? Una fantasía de "Mundo diferente" x "médico" sin trampas ni equipos modernos, escrita por Tsuda Houkou que además es un médico en funciones e ilustrada por el prometedor Takishita Nobuhide!

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん
みーちゃんとアイリ

description.en: Midori, a corporate slave, is being worked to death day and night. Her meals come from the convenience store, her refuge is alcohol and cigarettes, and she goes home only to sleep - such are the utterly wasteful days she leads. On her way home one day, she discovers a girl sleeping in the dumpster. She helps the girl on a whim, who introduces her self as Airi, a **witch**(!) with mysterious powers. Airi begs her, "Please let me stay with you for a while", and so begins their strange cohabitation life!? Warm and fluffy relief has arrived to Midori's weary days. These two mismatched ladies, a corporate slave office worker and a mess of a witch, begin their cohabitation life! (Translated from BookWalker)

altTitles.ja: 現実主義勇者の王国再建記

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Shugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki

altTitles.en: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom
A Realist Hero's Kingdom Restoration Chronicle

altTitles.fr: Comment un Héro réaliste reconstruit un Royaume

altTitles.vi: Công Cuộc Tái Thiết Vương Quốc Của Anh Hùng Chủ Nghĩa Hiện Thực

description.en:
"O, Hero!"

With that cliched line, Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure - did not begin. 

After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily, the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more, he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?! 

In order to get the country back on its feet, Souma calls the wise, the talented, and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?! 

What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?
description.fr: « Bonjour, Héros ». Après une convocation tout à fait banale dans un autre monde, Kazuya Souma se retrouve à l'aube d'une aventure épique–ou peux être pas. Après avoir présenté un plan pour renforcer économiquement et militairement le pays qui l'avait invoqué, le roi décide subitement de céder son trône à notre héros pour le meilleur et le pire, sans même demander l'avis de Kazuya. Et par-dessus tout, Kazuya se retrouva ainsi fiancé avec la propre fille de l'ancien roi. Afin d’obtenir un pays stable, il fera appel à tous les talents, les sages et les génies pour qu’ils soient à ses côtés. Cinq personnes se réunirent autour de Souma nouvellement couronné pour l’assister. Quels sont ces nombreux talents et les capacités qu’ils possèdent …!? Quelle sera la voie qu’il décidera d’emprunter pour ainsi révolutionner entièrement ce monde fantastique.
description.ja:
異世界に突如として勇者召喚された相馬一也。だが、彼の“勇者”としての冒険は――始まらなかった。国王から国家の抱える危機と課題を聞き出した彼は、持ち前の現代の知識を活かし富国強兵策を提案。すると……「召喚されし勇者ソーマ・カズヤに王位を譲る！」なんと、あろうことか国王より譲位されてしまう。さらに王女をソーマの婚約者にすると発表され――!?

若き国王ソーマと腹心の仲間とが共に国家の再興を目指す異世界本格内政ファンタジー開幕！

altTitles.ja: 境界のRINNE

description.en: As a child, Mamiya Sakura mysteriously disappeared in the woods behind her grandma's home. She returned whole and healthy, but since then, she has had the power to see ghosts. Now a teenager, she just wishes the ghosts would leave her alone! At school, the desk next to Sakura's has been empty since the start of the school year. Then one day her always-absent classmate Rokudo Rinne shows up, and he's far more than what he seems! After school one day, Rinne helps Sakura deal with the ghost of a boy who has a crush on her. Rinne, it seems, knows just how to handle such ghosts, and has the skills and tools to properly dispatch them to the afterlife (for a small fee of course). Sakura starts to learn more about her mysterious classmate, and her curiosity about Rinne draws her deeper into the amazing world between life and death.
description.id: Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Circle of Reincarnation Rinne**

altTitles.ja: サイバー・プラネット1999HYPER☆ルン

description.en: Rune Ayanokouji lives a life less ordinary with a "mad" scientist for a grandfather and mysterious humanoid robots popping up around town. It turns out there's an alien plot to take over the world, but there seems to be a set of aliens with a different agenda in mind. With a little unexpected help, Rune and her friends are able to fight these aliens on equal ground. But with the fate of Earth at stake, who can Rune really trust?

altTitles.ja: フェイト／ホロウアタラクシア

description.en:
The plot of Fate/hollow ataraxia is based half a year after the events of Fate/stay night. Like its preceding counterpart, the story is set in Fuyuki City. Bazett Fraga McRemitz, a member of the Mages' Association and a master in the 5th Holy Grail War, wakes on the fourth day of the 5th Holy Grail war with a new servant, Avenger, and no memory of what happened to her beforehand. She and Avenger set off to fight and win the Holy Grail War.  
  
Meanwhile, Shirō Emiya lives a peaceful life with all his friends from the 5th Holy Grail War. After one of her experiments changes time and space, Rin Tōsaka leaves for the Mages' Association in England to fix things. The Servants sense a new danger while dark creatures appear soon afterward. Shirō, as a precaution, sets off to ensure nobody is in danger and instead finds himself frequently meeting a mysterious girl, Caren Ortensia.  
  
Both Bazett and Shirō find themselves in time loop that lasts four days, beginning of the fourth day of the 5th Holy Grail War. Each time they die or survive four days, they always awake on the first day of the loop aware of what has happened to them since the first time loop began. Determined to end the loop, Bazett, Avenger, and Shirō fight to discover the truth behind what's causing the endless four days.

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters.
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.ja: 世界各国にヒーローがいる中、日本のヒーローは“恥ずかしがり屋”の少女だった!! 彼女を待ち受けるのは…!?
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

altTitles.ja: 可愛原先輩はかわいいがすき！

description.en:
Saotome-kun is short and terrible at sports. He thought that studying was his only good point, but in his new high school, his grades are a far cry from stellar. As he was feeling down and thinking he had nothing, the academically brilliant, sporty, elegant, and beautiful "Perfect Student Council President" Kawaibara-senpai approached him.
Having maintained her position at the top of the grade since she enrolled, she offers to tutor Saotome on one condition: he must wear a sailor uniform while studying with her. Their secret study sessions after school begin...
description.ja: 同作の主人公・早乙女くんは、背が小さく運動も苦手で、勉強だけが自分の取り柄だと考えていたが、入学した高校ではその勉強でもトップには程遠く、「自分にはなにもない」と落ち込んでいた。そんな早乙女に声をかけたのは、文武両道、容姿端麗な“完璧生徒会長”の可愛原（かわいばら）先輩。入試以来学年首席を守り続けている彼女は、早乙女に「特別に勉強を教えてあげてもいい」と提案する。しかしその条件として、自分と勉強しているときはセーラー服を着てほしいと女装を強要してきて……。放課後、秘密の勉強会が始まる。
